title: Лига городов
overview: «League of Cities» is a new humorous project of TNT TV channel and AMiK company, in which teams will compete for the title of Champion of the season and a prize of 10 million rubles. Mentors, humor gurus – Sergey Svetlakov, Marina Kravets, Alexey Shcherbakov and Artem Kalaijyan - will help the teams to win in a serious humorous battle. Each of them will select teams under his wing, with which he will «work» further.62 teams from 73 cities of Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan will take part in the first qualifying round. Only half of them will make it to the second round. Next, a stage of battles will take place, in which the teams of each mentor will compete with each other until there are four finalists left in the project. The winner of the season will be determined among them.
